fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.meter

Interface ElectricMeterCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, ElectricMeterImplementationI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ElectricMeterConnector, ElectricMeterInboundPort, ElectricMeterOutboundPort

    public interface ElectricMeterCI
extends ElectricMeterImplementationI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI
    The class ElectricMeterCI defines the services offered by and that can be required from an electric meter component.

    Description

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-09-19

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      SignalData<java.lang.Double> getCurrentConsumption()
      return the current total electric consumption in amperes.
      SignalData<java.lang.Double> getCurrentProduction()
      return the current total electric power production in watts.
      Measure<java.lang.Double> getTension()
      return the tension in the electric circuits of this meter.
